title: Vodafone NBN random ms spikes
body:
Recently switched over to Vodafone NBN, download speed is 90+mbs with out fluctuation except when I get into a game of league my ms will randomly spike every two minutes or so. 
Used to be on Telstra adsl2 getting a download speed of 12mbs and would have no issues with my connection.
Any help or advice would be appreciated
***The spikes are only occurring on league***
